# Interface ThresholdTopicInterface

ThresholdTopicInterface Configuration for topic detection threshold.

interface ThresholdTopicInterface {  
threshold: number;  
topicName: [TopicName](/enums/primitives_safety_types.TopicName);  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#primitives/safety/types.ThresholdTopicInterface))

  * [BasicTopicInterface](./primitives_safety_types.BasicTopicInterface)
    * ThresholdTopicInterface



##### Index

### Properties

threshold topicName

## Properties

### threshold

threshold: number

Threshold value between 0 and 1. Content with confidence above this is considered unsafe

### topicName

topicName: [TopicName](/enums/primitives_safety_types.TopicName)

The type of topic detected

Inherited from [BasicTopicInterface](./primitives_safety_types.BasicTopicInterface).[topicName](./primitives_safety_types.BasicTopicInterface#topicname)
